name: Don't Do That Again (V)
Lore: 'The Jedi won''t tolerate silly behavior for very long.',
Text: 'Plays on table. Once per game, may take into hand an Immediate Effect from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While opponent occupies no battleground systems, Mobilization Points is suspended. ''Missing'' on Always Thinking With Your Stomach is treated as ''landspeed = 0 for remainder of turn.''',
